content: Hey guys, I'm taking my first steps into FHIR so I hope I'm not asking the dumbest question ever :-) I'm a .NET developer and am wondering if there is a way to serialize profile 'changes' into an object? I'm looking for a way to create FHIR resources which validate with specific profiles...
Can you give an example of what you mean by "profile changes"?
There is also a dotnet specific stream for these types of questions #dotnet and a NuGet package HL7.fhir.specification that does validation.
